text: Potom, posle Nukha, My poslali yeshcho drugikh poslannikov, prizyvayushchikh k yedinobozhiyu, v kachestve vestnikov i uveshchevateley. My poslali ikh s yasnymi znameniyami, podtverzhdayushchimi, chto oni pravdivy. No nevernyye narody, kak i narod Nukha, otvergli svoikh poslannikov, poskol'ku oni speshili otritsat' znameniya Allakha, ne dumaya i ne razmyshlyaya o nikh. Tak Allakh nalozhil pechat' lzhi na serdtsa nechestivtsev, kotoryye otritsayut Istinu i znameniya Allakha
